thread.title: The best foods to eat before bed to get a better night's sleep
thread.title_full: The best foods to eat before bed to get a better night's sleep

author: Corey Protin, Matthew Stuart and Jessica Orwig
title: The best foods to eat before bed to get a better night's sleep
text:
embed 
The quality of your sleep is greatly affected by what you eat at night. As well as how soon before bed you eat your food. Here's the 4 foods that'll aid in a more restful sleep and the science behind why that is. 
Follow Tech Insider: On Facebook This story was originally published by Food & Wine . Most Popular
